source_caption_data.pre_caption: This time-lapse video captures a massive dust storm, known as a haboob, rolling across a desert landscape. The scene features saguaro cacti and desert shrubs in the foreground with a mountain range in the background. The immense wall of orange-brown dust advances from left to right, engulfing the mountains and sky.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This time-lapse video captures a massive dust storm, known as a haboob, rolling across a desert landscape. The scene features saguaro cacti and desert shrubs in the foreground with a mountain range in the background. The immense wall of orange-brown dust advances from left to right, engulfing the mountains and sky.

generated_critique: While the caption correctly identifies the subject as a haboob and its general direction of movement, it lacks the specific, dynamic details of the motion seen in the time-lapse. The term "rolling" is too simple; the video clearly shows the leading edge of the dust wall is not a smooth surface but is instead violently churning and billowing upwards as it advances. The caption also misses a key chronological detail: before the main wall engulfs the scene, a lower, faster-moving wave of dust is visible sweeping across the desert floor, obscuring the base of the cacti and shrubs first. Furthermore, a significant effect of the storm's motion is omitted: as the dust cloud moves in, it progressively blocks the sun, causing the ambient light to dim rapidly and cast the entire landscape in a deep orange hue before the mountains and sky are completely hidden from view. The description of the storm "engulfing" the background is accurate, but the caption could be improved by describing this process more sequentially, noting how the mountains are obscured from their base upwards until they vanish entirely into the turbulent cloud.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This time-lapse video captures a massive dust storm, known as a haboob, dramatically advancing across a desert landscape. The scene features saguaro cacti and desert shrubs in the foreground with a mountain range in the background. Initially, a swift, low wave of dust sweeps across the desert floor, obscuring the base of the cacti and shrubs. The leading edge of the haboob is not smooth but violently churning and billowing upwards as it progresses from left to right. As the immense wall of orange-brown dust approaches, it progressively blocks the sun, rapidly dimming the ambient light and casting the entire landscape in a deep orange hue. The mountains are gradually obscured from their base upwards until they vanish entirely into the turbulent cloud, completing the dramatic transformation of the scene.
